  • Lectures on A_g, the moduli space of abelian varieties (Course at YMSC, Tsinghua University, Autumn 2024) References are here .
  • Lectures on Siegel modular forms (Course at YMSC, Tsinghua University, Autumn 2023; Tuesdays and Thursdays 9:50-11:25)
  • Siegel modular forms (Luxembourg 2023). Schedule is here
  • Course on Abelian Varieties (Luxembourg 2022).
  • (Zoom) Lectures on Siegel Modular Forms (Fall 2020, YMSC, Tsinghua University) lectures via zoom. You can find lecture notes here.
  • Course Curves over Finite Fields (2019) The times and rooms are: Tuesday 15:20-16:55 Discussion room (112) in Jing Zhai; Thursday 13:30-15:05 Main Lecture Hall Jin Chun Yuan West Building.
